hero.title: Trusted Project Cargo Partner
hero.subtitle: At Haixun, we excel in providing customized logistics solutions for project cargo, ensuring client deadlines and requirements are met with precision.
hero.description: With expertise in handling oversized and sensitive shipments, we have successfully served clients such as Caterpillar China, electric car exporters, and construction companies.

services.title: Our Services
services.subtitle: Comprehensive logistics solutions tailored to your needs

lcl.title: LCL Services
lcl.description: HAIXUN operates its own consolidation services on multiple trade routes, providing complete transparency in pricing across origin, destination, and ocean freight charges.

fcl.title: FCL Services
fcl.description: HAIXUN owns a fleet of containers, including special equipment to accommodate customers’ unique requirements, specializing in multiple global trade lanes.

warehouse.title: Warehouse Management
warehouse.description: Equipped with state-of-the-art facilities, HAIXUN efficiently manages warehousing operations for various commodities, including cold storage with advanced technology.

project.title: Project Logistics
project.description: With a dedicated project division comprising industry experts, HAIXUN ensures the safe and timely handling of complex, large-scale project cargo.

air.title: Air Shipments
air.description: Offering customized Sea-Air and Air-Sea options, HAIXUN helps clients meet tight deadlines while optimizing logistics costs through flexible multimodal solutions.

customs.title: Customs Declaration & Inspection
customs.description: As a leading customs clearing agent, HAIXUN ensures smooth and efficient completion of all customs formalities and inspections with minimal delays.

oog.title: OOG Shipments
oog.description: Services offered include cargo loading, lashing, survey arrangements, and inter-island movement to major ports—handled by a team experienced in out-of-gauge cargo.

import.title: Import
import.description: Comprehensive import handling services supported by warehouses, yards, cranes, and advanced container handling equipment ensure seamless operations.

consolidation.title: LCL Consolidation
consolidation.description: Direct export consolidations to key destinations such as Singapore, Colombo, and Karachi, with extended connections to major global hubs.

about.title: About Haixun Global
about.subtitle: 30+ Years of Logistics Excellence
about.paragraph1: Haixun Global Shenzhen, leverages over 30 years of expertise in logistics, including sea, land, air transportation, customs declaration, warehousing, and distribution. The Group has expanded its network to regions such as China, India, Malaysia, the UAE, and beyond.
about.paragraph2: Established in 2019, Haixun Global Shenzhen upholds the Group's commitment to integrity, customer satisfaction, and rapid response, ensuring a reliable and customer-focused service experience in China.
about.paragraph3: Our services include tailored shipping plans with the selection of appropriate transport modes and equipment, such as Flat Rack, Open Top Containers, and Breakbulk Shipping. Focused on punctuality and cost-efficiency, we guarantee safe and on-time deliveries.

advantages.title: Our Advantages
advantages.subtitle: Delivering excellence through capacity, service, and expertise

transportation.title: Transportation Capacity
transportation.description: With a registered capital of 50 million yuan, the company has Jiefang, Dongfeng and Isuzu light format transportation vehicles, which are engaged in cargo transportation services all over the country.

logistics.title: Logistics Service
logistics.description: The company has advanced information system, which can be seen in the whole process, so that you can master the progress of each business at any time, and strict system prevents errors and accidents.

team.title: Team Personnel
team.description: The company has a highly competitive operation team, has been engaged in domestic cargo transportation services for many years, and has a rigorous transportation organization team.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.subtitle: Need to get in touch? No problem! You can use our contact form to send us a message.

footer.description: Leveraging over 30 years of expertise in logistics, including sea, land, air transportation, customs declaration, warehousing, and distribution.
